mapper.select: SELECT userId,cashBank,cashAccount,cash,stockBank,stockAccount,stock, depositBank,depositAccount,deposit, insuranceCompany,insuranceName,insurance, loanAmount,loanPurpose,period,interest,createDate FROM userAsset WHERE userId = #{userId} AND MONTH(createDate) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) AND YEAR(createDate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE userAsset SET cashBank = #{cashBank}, cashAccount = #{cashAccount}, cash = #{cash}, stockBank = #{stockBank}, stockAccount = #{stockAccount}, stock = #{stock}, depositBank = #{depositBank}, depositAccount = #{depositAccount}, deposit = #{deposit}, insuranceCompany = #{insuranceCompany}, insuranceName = #{insuranceName}, insurance = #{insurance}, loanAmount = #{loanAmount}, loanPurpose = #{loanPurpose}, period = #{period}, interest = #{interest} WHERE userId = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userAsset (userId, cash, stock, property, deposit, consume, loanAmount, loanPurpose, period) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cash}, #{stock}, #{property}, #{deposit}, #{consume}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanPurpose},#{period})
mapper.update: UPDATE userAsset SET cash = #{cash}, stock = #{stock}, property = #{property}, deposit = #{deposit}, consume = #{consume}, loanAmount = #{loanAmount}, loanPurpose = #{loanPurpose}, period = #{period} WHERE userId = #{userId}
